text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde guigira na phorgap Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, kha Hevenan ki Fhe Bakɨme, ana vhɨra nden kamgim, nde anan gumgir ŋaari ma. Nde tuituigip Zisas ga ndɨkndɨgɨri. Ana Fhe Bakɨme farasarigi ŋaara guma gum ana Fhe Bakɨmen rotu gari guman pan ma. Nza ana khothɨgap, khar ana khothɨgi ne bun nzuai.
